title: Lagos Nightlife Tour
description: Experience the vibrant nightlife of Lagos with visits to top clubs, bars, and entertainment venues.
features: Club entry; Professional guide; Transportation; Welcome drink

title: Abuja Cultural Heritage Walk
description: Explore the rich cultural heritage of Abuja through guided tours of historical sites and museums.
features: Museum entry; Cultural guide; Traditional lunch; Souvenir

title: Calabar Beach Resort Experience
description: Relax and unwind at Calabar's pristine beaches with luxury resort amenities and water activities.
features: Beach access; Water sports; Spa treatment; Gourmet meals

title: Kano Traditional Craft Workshop
description: Learn traditional Nigerian crafts including pottery, weaving, and leatherwork from master artisans.
features: Materials included; Expert instruction; Take home crafts; Cultural stories
